text: Power supply will be suspended in the following areas between 9 a.m. and 2 p.m. on January 18 (Monday) owing to maintenance works to be taken up at Ayyanarpuram substation. According to a statement from TANGEDCO here on Tuesday, the supply would be suspended in the following areas: Mappillaiyurani, Ayyanarpuram, Threspuram, Thalamuthu Nagar, Davispuram, Tharuvaikulam, Siluvaipatti, Alaghapuri, Rajapalayam and Pattinamaruthur.
title: Power shutdown
